Title: GENIE VINTAGE SWISS c.1919 LATER ERA DOUBLE HUNTER 44mm CASE POCKET WATCH
Description: TM ____________________________________________________________ VINTAGE GENIE c.1919 later ERA POCKET WATCH MADE IN GRENCHEN, SWITZERLAND; DOUBLE HUNTER CASE MEASURES 44mm; REAR OUTER COVER STAMPED 4C8004 INSIDE; CASE IS SILVER COLOR, TARNISHED BUT I DO NOT KNOW METAL COMPOSITION; FACE DIAMETER MEASURES APPROXIMATELY 34mm. MOVEMENT COVER IS STAMPED " GENIE " AND " ECHAPPEMENT CHRONOMETRIQUE " WITH VARIOUS AWARD MEDALS STAMPED IN A CIRCULAR PATTERN. MOVEMENT IS STAMPED " SWISS MADE " AND THE GENIE BELL MARK; MOVEMENT MEASURES APPROXIMATELY 35mm DIAMETER; CHAIN OF UNKNOWN COMPOSITION MEASURES APPROXIMATELY 33.5cm LENGTH INCLUDING LOOPS ON BOTH ENDS. Condition: Does not keep time. The spring will not wind. Missing face crystal. The hour and minute hands move properly when manually adjusted with the crown. ____________________________________________________________ Free USPS Priority Mail Shipping -- USA ONLY FAST ONE BUSINESS DAY HANDLING TIME Major credit cards accepted securely through Paypal. 14-day money back return policy if not completely satisfied with your purchase.
